title: When a Wolf Falls in Love with a Sheep
writer: Ching-yu Chen, Shing-Ming Ho, Chi-jan Hou, Kelly Yuan-Ling Yang
actors: Chen-tung Ko, Man-shu Chien, Bryan Shu-Hao Chang, Shu-yao Kuo
plot: Life is tough in a big city. Especially for a young Taiwanese photocopy clerk, whose recent breakup haunts him day in and day out. But like all urban romance he soon meets the eccentric ...
